The video was published on Facebook on O: 2020, with a caption describing the shooting down of an Azerbaijani fighter jet by Armenia.
The ongoing conflict between Azerbaijan: Karabakh is mentioned, providing context to the claim.
The video was shared on multiple social: including Facebook, Twitter, and YouTube, with similar claims.
A reverse image search using InVID: WeVerify revealed that the video is a longer version published on YouTube on August 22, 2020, with a description related to a war-themed video game called ARMA3.
